verses.verse: וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> came מִקֵּ֣ץ ׀ <S%H7093><s%> And it came to pass at the end עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> of twenty שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> years אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָ֧ה <S%H1129><s%> had built שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> wherein Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> and his own house

וְהֶעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> That the cities אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> had restored חוּרָם֙ <S%H2361><s%> which Huram לִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon בָּנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> built שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וַיּ֥וֹשֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> to dwell שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> them and caused the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel
וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon חֲמָ֣ת צוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2578><s%> to Hamathzobah וַיֶּחֱזַ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> and prevailed עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> And he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּדְמֹ֖ר <S%H8412><s%> Tadmor בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities הַֽמִּסְכְּנ֔וֹת <S%H4543><s%> and all the store אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> which he built בַּחֲמָֽת׃ <S%H2574><s%> in Hamath

וַיִּ֜בֶן <S%H1129><s%> Also he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֤ית חוֹרוֹן֙ <S%H1032><s%> Bethhoron הָֽעֶלְי֔וֹן <S%H5945><s%> the upper וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית חוֹר֖וֹן <S%H1032><s%> and Bethhoron הַתַּחְתּ֑וֹן <S%H8481><s%> the nether עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities מָצ֔וֹר <S%H4692><s%> fenced חוֹמ֖וֹת <S%H2346><s%> with walls דְּלָתַ֥יִם <S%H1817><s%> gates וּבְרִֽיחַ׃ <S%H1280><s%> and bars

וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּעֲלָ֗ת <S%H1191><s%> And Baalath וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עָרֵ֤י <S%H5892><s%> cities הַֽמִּסְכְּנוֹת֙ <S%H4543><s%> and all the store אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> had לִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> that Solomon וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities הָרֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> had and all the chariot וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> and the cities הַפָּרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6571><s%> of the horsemen וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵ֣שֶׁק <S%H2837><s%> desire שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> and all that Solomon אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after חָשַׁק֙ <S%H2836><s%> have a delight לִבְנ֤וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בִּירֽוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וּבַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> and in Lebanon וּבְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and throughout all the land מֶמְשַׁלְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4474><s%> dominion

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָ֠עָם <S%H5971><s%> [As for] all the people הַנּוֹתָ֨ר <S%H3498><s%> [that were] left מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַחִתִּ֜י <S%H2850><s%> of the Hittites וְהָאֱמֹרִ֤י <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּי֙ <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites וְהַחִוִּ֣י <S%H2340><s%> and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֔י <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> were not מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> which [were] not of Israel הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1121><s%> [But] of their children אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who נוֹתְר֤וּ <S%H3498><s%> who were left אַחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H310><s%> after בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not כִלּ֖וּם <S%H3615><s%> consumed בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> whom the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיַּעֲלֵ֤ם <S%H5927><s%> make to pay שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> not them did Solomon לְמַ֔ס <S%H4522><s%> tribute עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> until this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> But of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> make שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> did Solomon לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> no servants לִמְלַאכְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4399><s%> for his work כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֜מָּה <S%H1992><s%> but אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H582><s%> but they [were] men מִלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> of war וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and chief שָׁלִישָׁ֔יו <S%H7991><s%> of his captains וְשָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and captains רִכְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7393><s%> of his chariots וּפָרָשָֽׁיו׃ <S%H6571><s%> and horsemen פ

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> And these [were] the chief [הַנְּצִיבִים כ] (הַנִּצָּבִ֛ים <S%H5333><s%> garrison ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon's חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּמָאתָ֑יִם <S%H3967><s%> [even] two hundred הָרֹדִ֖ים <S%H7287><s%> that bare rule בָּעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> over the people

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh הֶעֱלָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> brought up שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon מֵעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> out of the city דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> of David לַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> unto the house אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּֽנָה־ <S%H1129><s%> that he had built לָ֑הּ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> for her for he said לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֵשֵׁ֨ב <S%H3427><s%> shall not dwell אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> My wife לִי֙ בְּבֵית֙ <S%H1004><s%> in the house דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> of David מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> because [the places are] holy הֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> the places אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where בָּֽאָ֥ה <S%H935><s%> hath come אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> whereunto the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פ

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then הֶעֱלָ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> offered שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> Then Solomon עֹל֖וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> on the altar יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> which he had built לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאוּלָֽם׃ <S%H197><s%> the porch

וּבִדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Even after a certain rate י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> every day בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to the daily לְהַעֲלוֹת֙ <S%H5927><s%> offering כְּמִצְוַ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> according to the commandment מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses לַשַּׁבָּתוֹת֙ <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbaths וְלֶ֣חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2320><s%> and on the new moons וְלַמּ֣וֹעֲד֔וֹת <S%H4150><s%> and on the solemn feasts שָׁל֥וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> three פְּעָמִ֖ים <S%H6471><s%> times בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> in the year בְּחַ֧ג <S%H2282><s%> [even] in the feast הַמַּצּ֛וֹת <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread וּבְחַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> and in the feast הַשָּׁבֻע֖וֹת <S%H7620><s%> of weeks וּבְחַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> and in the feast הַסֻּכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5521><s%> of tabernacles

וַיַּעֲמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> And he appointed כְּמִשְׁפַּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> according to the order דָּֽוִיד־ <S%H1732><s%> of David אָ֠בִיו <S%H1><s%> his father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחְלְק֨וֹת <S%H4256><s%> the courses הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for עֲבֹדָתָ֗ם <S%H5656><s%> to their service וְהַלְוִיִּ֣ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for מִ֠שְׁמְרוֹתָם <S%H4931><s%> to their charges לְהַלֵּ֨ל <S%H1984><s%> to praise וּלְשָׁרֵ֜ת <S%H8334><s%> and minister נֶ֤גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> before the priests לִדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> as the duty י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> of every day בְּיוֹמ֔וֹ <S%H3117><s%> required וְהַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֥ים <S%H7778><s%> the porters בְּמַחְלְקוֹתָ֖ם <S%H4256><s%> also by their courses לְשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> at every gate וָשָׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> had so מִצְוַ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> commanded דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> for so had David אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not סָרוּ֩ <S%H5493><s%> And they departed מִצְוַ֨ת <S%H4687><s%> not from the commandment הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <S%H3548><s%> unto the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֛ם <S%H3881><s%> and Levites לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> concerning any matter וְלָאֹצָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H214><s%> or concerning the treasures

וַתִּכֹּן֙ <S%H3559><s%> was prepared כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלֶ֣אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> Now all the work שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and until הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto the day מוּסַ֥ד <S%H4143><s%> of the foundation בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and until כְּלֹת֑וֹ <S%H3615><s%> and until it was finished שָׁלֵ֖ם <S%H8003><s%> was perfected בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> [So] the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס

אָז֩ <S%H227><s%> Then הָלַ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Then went שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon לְעֶצְיֽוֹן־ גֶּ֧בֶר <S%H6100><s%> to Eziongeber וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אֵיל֛וֹת <S%H359><s%> and to Eloth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> side הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> at the sea בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> of Edom

וַיִּֽשְׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> sent לוֹ֩ חוּרָ֨ם <S%H2361><s%> And Huram בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> him by the hands עֲבָדָ֜יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants [אֹונִיֹּות כ] (אֳנִיֹּ֗ות <S%H591><s%> ship ק) וַעֲבָדִים֮ <S%H5650><s%> and servants י֣וֹדְעֵי <S%H3045><s%> that had knowledge יָם֒ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they went עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with עַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> with the servants שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon אוֹפִ֔ירָה <S%H211><s%> to Ophir וַיִּקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> and took מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there אַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> thence four מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty כִּכַּ֣ר <S%H3603><s%> talents זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וַיָּבִ֖יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [them] to king שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon פ
